docs.text: a lot of times a three-star film will be my favorite .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they're usually the kind of movie i can watch most often too .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they're usually not too deep , allowing for semi-brainless relaxation , and at the same time , not too dumb .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: men in black is a four-star three-star film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ( hope you could follow that one )
docs.label: positive

docs.text: men in black doesn't wait to get to the fun .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: just minutes into the film we are introduced to agent kay ( tommy lee jones ) , introduced to an alien , and introduced to the the awesome memory-diminishing tool that all mib agents use .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after all , you can't have alien witnesses running around with that kind of knowledge can you ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: men in black is , of course , the organization which " moniters all extra-terrestrial activity on earth " .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nypd officer james edwards ( will smith ) , is on a routine foot chase when suddenly the no-good punk he's chasing starts leaping up buildings and blinking more than one pair of eyes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the alien delivers the simple message that the world is going to end , and with that , dives off of a roof .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: naturally nobody believes his story .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nobody that is , except for the top secret organization that not even the government is aware of .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: edwards then meets agent kay , the man who never seems to crack a smile , and is introduced to the mib .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: edwards winds up joining the team and is stripped of anything that can point back to him ( birth certificate , drivers license , and even the literal removal of his fingerprints ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: james edwards no longer exists .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: meet agent jay .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: agent kay takes the rookie jay under his wing as they go about " regular " duties .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: eventually a far more treacherous event comes into play .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a " bug " has landed on earth and is going to wipe out mankind if these two don't ( or can't ) stop it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the plot isn't exactly clear , but we know it has to do with a galaxy as big as a jewel or marble being sought after on earth , and that is crucial that the mib find it before the " bug " does .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: barry sonnenfeld , who also did the addams family films , directs this nicely .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's fun , it's funny , it's action-packed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a nice summer blockbuster as it rightfully turned out to be .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is one of those movies that is just " fun " and can't really be summed up any nicer or clearer .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: will smith and tommy lee jones both do great jobs and both are a blast to watch .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: definitely one of the best films of the the summer of '97 , men in black comes highly recommeded from me !
docs.label: positive
